title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Military and Air Defense Assets in Lebanon: An Inside Look”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a military building and observation post in Lebanon; last night, military assets were attacked that served the air defense unit of Hezbollah.

A short time ago, fighter jets attacked a military building in the Bint Jbeil area and an observation post in the Mirkava area. Additionally, yesterday (Friday), fighter jets attacked a military command and a military site in Lebanon that served the air defense unit in the terrorist organization Hezbollah.

Also, following alerts about the intrusion of a hostile aircraft in the north of the country, it was a false identification, the event is over.

Attached is footage from yesterday’s attacks: https://bit.ly/3SULRWK
